attributes.action: Cancel Road Tax, and add 1p to fuel duty/tax instead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By nullifying the need for road tax, savings can be made on administration and policing, as vehicle will require fuel.  The more economical pay more, cause they use less fuel, the un-economical pay more because they use more fuel, and no-one gets to avoid it.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/road-tax-duty/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
